thread.title: Pregnant Cheryl may have posed for nude baby shoot

author: Ryan Smith
title: Pregnant Cheryl may have posed for nude baby shoot

persons.name: liam but i am so happy

organizations.name: boohoo lauren long sleeved ribbed bodycon dress buy
pap fleur khaki cold shoulder jumper dress buy

text:
While she's yet to publicly confirm that she's expecting her first child with Liam Payne, Cheryl 's bulging baby bump has all but announced the news.
And now it appears that the 33-year-old pop star may have disrobed for a special baby bump shoot - reminiscent of Demi Moore's famous 1991 Vanity Fair cover, taken while she was seven months pregnant with daughter Scout LaRue.
On Friday morning, fashion photographer Mariano Vivanco took to Instagram to share a behind-the-scenes shot of crumpled red sheet atop a wooden stool, longside the caption 'My Devine @cherylofficial…'.
Scroll down for video
Oh baby! Cheryl, who first showed off her bump in November, may have posed for a nude pregnancy shoot with Peruvian fashion photograpger Mariano Vivanco
Steal Cheryl's style in an Alexander Wang khaki dress £530 Alexander Wang Perforated Stripe Crew Neck Dress
Now reduced to £196 at Goodhood London
Buy now
Cheryl's been taking maternity dressing in her stride, sticking to her savvy sartorial ways throughout her pregnancy.
Just before Christmas she stepped out in a look put together for her by Anna Hughes-Chamberlain. Sporting a khaki ribbed bodycon dress by Alexander Wang teamed with a check panel Fendi coat, she accessorised her look with an embellished clutch and over-the-knee boots by Alexander McQueen.
We're loving this look on Cheryl! You can't beat a bit of khaki in your wardrobe and we love this funky twist on a traditional jumper dress thanks to the edgy cut-out detail.
Click right to get this must-have dress from Goodhood London, or recreate Cheryl’s look with one of the khaki ribbed dresses from our edit below, including picks from Bohooo, Miss Pap, Missguided and ASOS.

Special announcement: On Friday, Mariano Vivanco took to his Instagram account to share a behind-the-scenes shot - the image, and a teaser video, were soon deleted
Apparently excited about his project, he also took to his social media account to announce in a video: 'I’m shooting someone very special today.'
However, it seems that he may have spoken out of turn, as the image and announcement were soon erased from his account with no explanation.
With Beyoncé's scantily-clad announcement earlier this week that she is expecting twins, Cheryl's shoot would put her in a crowded hall of celebrities who have opted to strip down and show off their growing baby bumps in all their glory.
Classic: Demi Moore famously displayed her baby bump on the cover of Vanity Fair in 1991
Double dose of joy! Earlier this week, singing superstar Beyoncé stripped down to her lingerie to announce she's expecting twins
Selfie-loving sisters Kim and Kourtney Kardashian have stripped off for nude pregnancy shoots, as have the likes of Shakira, Kelly Rowland and Rebekah Vardy.
Last month, Cheryl's very prominent bump could be seen in all its glory as she prepared for a completely different photoshoot.
The star was on set after having her hair styled by Wendy Iles, who took an Instagram story of the Fight For This Love hitmaker on a monitor while she prepared for her close up.
Bumping along nicely! Pregnant Cheryl's very prominent bump could be seen in all its glory as she prepared for a photoshoot last month
Cover up girl: The star, 33, was on set after having her hair styled by Wendy Iles, who took an Instagram story of the Fight For This Love hitmaker on a monitor while she prepared for her close up
Perfectionist: Wearing a tight black dress, the singer's large bump could clearly be seen while an assistant fussed with it to ensure the number looked perfect
Wearing a tight black dress, the singer's large bump could clearly be seen while an assistant fussed with it to ensure the number looked perfect.
After the video, Wendy shared a snap of a glowing Cheryl showing off her coiffed mane in all its glory with a huge smile on her face.
The accompanying caption read: 'Cheryl! love her to bits. Job done ✅ on way back to Paris.'
Stunning: After the video, Wendy shared a snap of a glowing Cheryl showing off her coiffed mane in all its glory with a huge smile on her face
Cheryl first showed off her bump before Christmas when she attended the Fayre of St. James Christmas Concert in London in November.
She has refused to comment publicly on the pregnancy, but is said to be 'ecstatic' about starting a family with Liam, 23.
The shoot comes after her former manager will.i.am sent his well-wishes to the star, revealing that he's happy her love life is taking a positive turn.
Pals: The Black Eyed Peas star, who famously managed Cheryl's solo career until they parted ways in 2013, told Closer magazine: 'Cheryl is awesome and I am so happy for her – she is always in and out of bad relationships
The Black Eyed Peas star, who famously managed Cheryl's solo career until they parted ways in 2013, told Closer magazine: 'Cheryl is awesome and I am so happy for her – she is always in and out of bad relationships.
Speaking about her pregnancy, which she is yet to confirm, will.i.am said: 'She is expecting a baby but it could be a beer belly, right?'
'I haven’t really met Liam but I am so happy for her, she deserves it,' the star added.
Cheryl has had a rocky road to true love; she was married to footballer Ashley Cole for four years, but the pair split following allegations of his infidelity.
Joker: Speaking about her pregnancy, which she is yet to confirm, will.i.am said, 'She is expecting a baby but it could be a beer belly, right?'
The pop princess wed French restaurateur Jean-Bernard Fernandez-Versini in 2014 after just three months of dating, but they split at the end of 2015.
Cheryl and will.i.am were formerly great friends, collaborating on chart-topping tune Heartbreaker in 2007.
However, in 2013 the brunette ditched the US producer as her management in a bid to take her career in a new direction.
Cheryl, 33, and Liam, 23, are alleged to be expecting a child together.
Back in the day: Cheryl and will.i.am were formerly great friends, collaborating on chart-topping tune Heartbreaker in 2007
The Fight For This Love hitmaker revealed a huge baby bump as she attended the Quintessentially Foundation fair of St James Christmas Carol Concert in December.
A spokesperson for Cheryl told MailOnline that she will not be commenting on the matter.
The couple first met in 2008 when Liam was a teenage contestant on The X Factor and Cheryl was a judge.
They went public with their romance in February, just weeks after Cheryl announced her split from husband Jean-Bernard after 18 months of marriage.
But the genetically-blessed twosome are said to have started dating in secret as early as December 2015.
Baby-faced Liam was 14 when he first auditioned for the show but he returned as a solo artist in 2010 only to be partnered with Niall Horan, Harry Styles, Zayn Malik and Louis Tomlinson, who went on to become global boyband One Direction.
True love: Cheryl and Liam went public with their romance in February, just weeks after Cheryl announced her split from husband Jean-Bernard after 18 months of marriage
